Text: Re HiHi Geoff Im really sorry to hear about your father I hope that everything is getting better now after all that terrible thing Ill pray for him too Im glad to hear that you already have a daughter My youngest son is slightly older than your daughter He is eightmonth old Im still doing commodity trading like before rice tapioca and yellow maize Now we are also investing on Corn Oil project Well just keep in touch Geoff write to me when you have time Harry Original Message From Storey Geoff Geoff NRONcom To Hariyono Tan Sent Tuesday September AM Subject RE Hi Hey Harry Great to hear from you Im alright but in am sorry to say my father was on the th floor of the north tower when the first plane hit He was unfortunately one of many that didnt make it out So the last few weeks have been difficult He had funeral services for him on Saturday Sorry to drop such terrible news on you Yes i am married now and i have a month old baby Cameron James Storey Things were going great before Tuesday i am woring at Enron as a natural gas trader and love my job let me know what you are doing these days geof Original Message From Hariyono Tan mailto Sent Wednesday September AM To Geoff Storey Subject Hi Hi Geoff How are you doing Is been awhile since the last time I wrote Im just worried about all my friends in the States after the attack of WTC I just want to make sure that you are find The last time you wrote to me youre engaged already Are you married now or maybe you have kids already Write me back ok Best regards Hariyono This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
